verses.verse: Now after <S%H310>this<s%> it came to pass, that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H3665>subdued<s%> them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1661>Gath<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.
And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; and the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> became <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>gifts<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%> unto <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, as he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H5324>stablish<s%> his <S%H3027>dominion<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> from him a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376%H7273>footmen<s%>: <S%H1732>David<s%> also <S%H6131>houghed<s%> all the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> horses, but <S%H3498>reserved<s%> of them an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>.

And when the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> garrisons in <S%H758%H1834>Syria-damascus<s%>; and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> became <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>gifts<s%>. Thus the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>preserved<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> whithersoever he <S%H1980>went<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7982>shields<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> that were on the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Likewise from <S%H2880>Tibhath<s%>, and from <S%H3560>Chun<s%>, <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%>, <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5178>brass<s%>, wherewith <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

¶ Now when <S%H8583>Tou<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> how <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> all the <S%H2428>host<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>;

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1913>Hadoram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, to <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of his <S%H7965>welfare<s%>, and to <S%H1288>congratulate<s%> him, because he had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%>, and <S%H5221>smitten<s%> him; (for <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> had <S%H376%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H8583>Tou<s%>;) and with him all manner of <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

¶ Them also <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, with the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that he <S%H5375>brought<s%> from all these <S%H1471>nations<s%>; from <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and from <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and from the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and from <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>.

Moreover <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H8083%H6240>eighteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%>; and all the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> became <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>. Thus the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>preserved<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> whithersoever he <S%H1980>went<s%>.
¶ So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%> among all his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> was over the <S%H6635>host<s%>; and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud<s%>, <S%H2142>recorder<s%>.

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar<s%>, were the <S%H3548>priests<s%>; and <S%H7798>Shavsha<s%> was <S%H5608>scribe<s%>;

And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was over the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%> and the <S%H6432>Pelethites<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> were <S%H7223>chief<s%> <S%H3027>about<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
